## USA Graph
```{r, raw_data, x}
raw_data <- x %>%  
  clean_names() %>% 
  slice(2:38) %>%
  select(government_function, whole_dollars) %>%
  filter(whole_dollars < 1000000000) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = whole_dollars, y = fct_reorder(government_function, whole_dollars))) + 
  geom_col(alpha = 0.5) + 
  labs(title = "Total Dollar Amount Per Government Department", 
       subtitle = "The Education department gets the most amount of money annually",
       x = "Money earned",
       y = "Government Job Department") + 
  theme_classic() +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = scales::number_format())

raw_data
```
## Description
The USA graph shows the total amount of money each department earns annually in the whole country.
